MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 7:30pm in the CW11 postcode area of Sandbach following reports of a safety concern on the overhead network. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm . We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:32pm on 23rd December 2020
